message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor.  How about a 55/45 split? It accounts for the time value of money as well.
Let's be reasonable. A 50/50 split is the fairest option, considering the diminishing value of money.  It's time to meet in the middle.
